class.name: Matrix3
class.description: 3x3 matrix used for 3D rotation and scale. Contains 3 vector fields x,y and z. Can also be accessed as array of 3D vectors. Almost always used as orthogonal basis for a [Transform].

method.name: Matrix3
method.description: Create a matrix from a quaternion.

method.name: Matrix3
method.description: Create a matrix from an axis vector and an angle.

method.name: Matrix3
method.description: Create a matrix from 3 axis vectors.

method.name: determinant
method.description: Return the determinant of the matrix.

method.name: get_euler
method.description: Return euler angles from the matrix.

method.name: inverse
method.description: Return the affine inverse of the matrix.

method.name: orthonormalized
method.description: Return the orthonormalized version of the matrix (useful to call from time to time to avoid rounding error).

method.name: rotated
method.description: Return the rotated version of the matrix, by a given axis and angle.

method.name: scaled
method.description: Return the scaled version of the matrix, by a 3D scale.

method.name: tdotx
method.description: Transposed dot product with the x axis of the matrix.

method.name: tdoty
method.description: Transposed dot product with the y axis of the matrix.

method.name: tdotz
method.description: Transposed dot product with the z axis of the matrix.

method.name: transposed
method.description: Return the transposed version of the matrix.

method.name: xform
method.description: Return a vector transformed by the matrix and return it.

method.name: xform_inv
method.description: Return a vector transformed by the transposed matrix and return it.
